rukus.text: 26|34|tanre currumulla pramukhanmareat avan (phir'aun) parannu: tirccayayum ivan vivaramulla oru jalavidyakkaran tanneyan‌
26|35|tanre jalavidyakeant ninnalute nattilninn ninnale purattakkan avan uddesikkunnu atinal ‍ninnal ent nirdesikkunnu
26|36|avar parannu: avannum avanre saheadarannum tankal savakasam nalkuka alukale viliccukuttan nagarannalilekk tankal dutanmare niyeagikkukayum ceyyuka
26|37|ella vivaramulla jalavidyakkareyum avar tankalute atutt keantu varatte
26|38|annane ariyappetta oru divasam niscitamaya oru samayatt jalavidyakkar orumiccukuttappettu
26|41|annane jalavidyakkar vannettiyappeal phir'auneat avar ceadiccu: nannalan vijayikalakunnatenkil ‍tirccayayum nannalkk pratiphalamuntayirikkumea
26|42|avan (phir'aun) parannu: ate, tirccayayum ninnal samipyam nalkappetunnavarute kuttattilayirikkum
26|43|musa avareat parannu: ninnalkk itanullatellam ninnal ittukealluka
26|44|appeal tannalute kayarukalum vatikalum avar ittu avar parayukayum ceytu: phir'aunre pratapam tanneyana satyam! tirccayayum nannal tanneyayirikkum vijayikal
26|45|anantaram musa tanre vati taleyittu appealata at avar vyajamayi nirmiccirunnatineyellam vilunnikkalayunnu

26|49|avan (phir'aun) parannu: nan ninnalkk anuvadam tarunnatin mumpayi ninnal avanil ‍visvasiccuvennea? tirccayayum ivan ninnalkk jalavidya pathippicca ninnalute talavan tanneyan valiye ninnal arinnu keallum tirccayayum ninnalute kaikalum, ninnalute kalukalum etir ‍vasannalilninnayikkeant nan muriccu kalayukayum, ninnale muluvan nan krusikkukayum ceyyunnatan‌
26|50|avar parannu: kulappamilla tirccayayum nannal nannalute raksitavinkalekk matannippeakunnavarakunnu
26|51|nannal adyamayi visvasiccavarayatinal ‍nannalute terrukal nannalute raksitav nannalkk pearuttutarumenn nannal asikkunnu
26|52|musaykk nam beadhanam nalki: enre dasanmareyum keant ratriyil ‍ni purappettukealluka tirccayayum (satrukkal) ninnale pintutaran peakukayan‌
